CustomField.description: Formats closure goal for external email templates as "Month Day". Example: September 4th
CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH( DATEVALUE( Goal_Close_DT_Stamp__c ) ), 1, "January ", 2, "February ", 3, "March ", 4, "April ", 5, "May ", 6, "June ", 7, "July ", 8, "August ", 9, "September ", 10, "October ", 11, "November ", 12, "December ", "" ) & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( Goal_Close_DT_Stamp__c ) ) ) & CASE( DAY( DATEVALUE( Goal_Close_DT_Stamp__c ) ), 1, "st", 2, "nd", 3, "rd", 21, "st", 22, "nd", 23, "rd", 31, "st", "th" )
CustomField.label: Goal Close Formatted
